pr_title: Roundup decimal points when compressing AnomalyTimelinesView

timeline.message: Roundup decimal points when compressing AnomlayTimeLinesView

timeline.bodyText: I think that the roundup logic is better added into compress(DEFAULT_MAX_LENGTH), because people can call either these two methods to compress and roundup should run in both cases.
timeline.author: vincentchenjl

replies.bodyText: Good suggestion. That also avoids some code duplications. At first I wanted to avoid putting it in compress(DEFAULT_MAX_LENGTH) since that one is called recursively. But now I think it is actually more robust to have this roundup every time we do compression. modified.
replies.author: Ruoyingw

timeline.bodyText: Could we add another check to make sure that the JSON exported also has 3 decimal points? For example Assert.assertEquals(OBJECT_MAPPER.writeValueAsString(compressedView.getBaselineValues().get(i)), "2.833")
timeline.author: vincentchenjl

timeline.message: Roundup decimal points when compressing AnomlayTimeLinesView
move getRoundDouble() to utils and add more tests
